SA07subhrk_u:343: yad gacchanti kṣitīśā hayarathakaribhir vandyamānā janaughaiś
SA07subhrk_u:345: rājā yac chakravartī varanṛpatiśatair yāti sārdhaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
SA07subhrk_u:346: kṣetre samyak tad etat pravaraguṇaphalaṃ śodhite dānabījāt //
SA07subhrk_u:347: māndhātā mudgadānāt kṣitipatir abhavat pāṃśudānād aśoko
SA07subhrk_u:348: rājā vai kapphiṇākhyas tridaśapatir abhūt pañcasārapradānāt /
SA07subhrk_u:349: citrākhyaḥ kṣīradānān madhu panasayutaṃ kṣīṇadoṣāya dattvā
SA07subhrk_u:351: dattaṃ bahv api naiva tad bahuphalaṃ satpātrahīnaṃ dhanaṃ
SA07subhrk_u:354: dānaṃ svalpam api prayāti bahutāṃ nyagrodhabījaṃ yathā //
SA07subhrk_u:356: SRKK_115 yo dharmaratnaṃ likhatīha nityaṃ śṛṇoti tac cintayate sadaiva /
SA07subhrk_u:357: saṃbhāvanāṃ vā yadi cātra kuryāj jātismaratvaṃ labhate sa nityam //
SA07subhrk_u:358: SRKK_116 yad devaloke varakalpavṛkṣāḥ sarvārthasaṃsiddhikarā bhavanti /
SA07subhrk_u:359: devottamānāṃ sukhahetubhūtās tat gopradānasya phalaṃ viśālam //
SA07subhrk_u:360: yad garbhe paripuṣṭim eti śucibhiḥ pronnīyamāno rasair
SA07subhrk_u:361: bālye yan madhusarpiṣī ca pibati kṣīraṃ ca kāle punaḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:363: vṛddhatve ca yathepsitaṃ vararasaṃ tad gopradānodbhavam //
SA07subhrk_u:364: SRKK_118 siṃhāsanaṃ pramudito ruciraṃ gaṇāya bhaktyā dadāti vidhivat khalu yaḥ sa dātā /
SA07subhrk_u:365: siṃhāsanāni labhate pravarāṇy abhedyaṃ vajrāsanaṃ ca surapannagasiddhavandyam //
SA07subhrk_u:366: SRKK_119 sauvarṇapātre satataṃ narendrā yat kṣīram aśnanti rasādiyuktam /
SA07subhrk_u:367: lakṣmīsamṛddhāś ca narīr labhante padmānanās tan mahiṣīpradānāt //
SA07subhrk_u:368: SRKK_120 yānapradānena sadāturāṇāṃ sudurbalānāṃ vahanena caiva /
SA07subhrk_u:369: saṃmānanāṃ vai kurute gurūṇām ṛddhiṃ samāpnoti naras tu tena //
SA07subhrk_u:370: SRKK_121 aśvair vicitraiḥ satataṃ vahanti suvarṇapattracchuritair narendrāḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:371: ṛddhyā ca gacchanti sudūradeśaṃ yānapradānāt tu tad eva martyāḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:372: SRKK_122 hārārdhahāraiḥ kaṭakair upetāḥ krīḍanti deveṣu manojñavarṇāḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:373: sārdhaṃ hi yat tat tridaśādhipena niḥsaṅgadānāt pravadanti santaḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:374: SRKK_123 bhītān samāśvāsayate sadaiva dhīmān naro vākpratipādanena /
SA07subhrk_u:375: sarvair na māraiḥ paribhūyate 'sau vākyaṃ ca nityaṃ madhuraṃ śṛṇoti //
SA07subhrk_u:376: SRKK_124 yad arhayantīha jinasya vākyaiḥ kleśāribhaṅgair bhuvi dharmadhātum /
SA07subhrk_u:377: saṃsārasaukhyaṃ tv anubhūya sarvaṃ dharmeśvaratvaṃ pravaraṃ labhante //
SA07subhrk_u:378: SRKK_125 pratiśrayaṃ te pradiśanti santaḥ sarvatra kāle śramapīḍitānām /
SA07subhrk_u:379: te yānti nākaṃ satataṃ prahṛṣṭāḥ śakreṇa sārdhaṃ ca sadā ramante //
SA07subhrk_u:380: SRKK_126 ye ropayantīha sukānanāni vṛkṣāṃś ca puṣpāṇi ca gandhavanti /
SA07subhrk_u:381: cyutvāpi te yānti divaṃ manuṣyā udyānamālādyupabhogayuktāḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:382: SRKK_127 kurvanti setuṃ viṣame pradeśe pānīyamadhye 'pi ca ye manuṣyāḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:383: svargaṃ sadā bhogasamanvitaṃ hi yānty uttamaṃ te varahemagātrāḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:384: SRKK_128 vāpītaḍāgāni suśobhanāni kṛtvā narāḥ svargam avāpnuvanti /
SA07subhrk_u:385: ihaiva loke ca manuṣyabhūtā rājyāni ramyāṇi sukhāvahāni //
SA07subhrk_u:386: SRKK_129 kūpān maṭhān sattvasamāśrayāṃś ca vātātapatrāṇanimittabhūtān /
SA07subhrk_u:387: ye kārayanti pravarān manuṣyās te devabhūtāḥ sukhino bhavanti //
SA07subhrk_u:388: SRKK_130 chattrāṇi ye vā pratipādayanti sūryāṃśutāpena suduḥkhiteṣu /
SA07subhrk_u:389: chattropagās te jitaśatrusaṃghā bhavanti nityaṃ varasaukhyayuktāḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:390: SRKK_131 pādāśrayaṃ citram upānahau ca sarveṣu sattveṣu diśanti bhaktyā /
SA07subhrk_u:391: yānottamais te suciraṃ prayānti deveṣu martyesu sadopapannāḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:392: SRKK_132 śaṃsanti ye jinavaraṃ guṇakīrtanena kāyapraṇāmakriyayā ca gurūṃś ca sarvān /
SA07subhrk_u:393: saṃmānanāṃ gurukulāt samavāpnuvanti jātiṃ tathaiva vacanapratisaṃvidaṃ ca //
SA07subhrk_u:394: SRKK_133 mṛdaṅgavīṇāpaṭahādibhir ye kurvanti pūjāṃ sugatottamānām /
SA07subhrk_u:396: SRKK_134 yaṣṭiṃ samāropayati prahṛṣṭaś chattraṃ ca ghaṇṭāṃ sugatasya caitye /
SA07subhrk_u:397: chattrāvalīṃ vā kurute sa tena lakṣmīṃ samāpnoti naro viśālām //
SA07subhrk_u:398: SRKK_135 manuṣyabhūto bhuvi yaḥ samantād īśatvam āpnoti balena yuktaḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:399: keyūramuktābharaṇair upeto bhūmipradānāt tad uśanti santaḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:400: SRKK_136 bimbaṃ karoti pravaraṃ jinasya stūpaṃ ca vā chattravarair upetam /
SA07subhrk_u:401: dhātuṃ samāropayatīha yaś ca svargaṃ samāpnoti naras tu tena //
SA07subhrk_u:402: SRKK_137 ye buddham uddiśya mahānti nityaṃ kurvanti mṛdgomayalepanāni /
SA07subhrk_u:403: puṣpaṃ phalaṃ bhojanapānakaṃ vā yacchanti te rājabalaṃ labhante //
SA07subhrk_u:404: SRKK_138 dīpān udārān vividhāṃś ca gandhān puṣpāṇi dhūpaṃ guḍapānakaṃ vā /
SA07subhrk_u:405: diśanti saṃghasya tathā ca hema bhavanti te devasukhena yuktāḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:406: SRKK_139 stūpāṅganaṃ dhātuvaraṃ vihāraṃ ye śodhayantīha narāḥ prayatnaiḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:407: nirmālyam ebhyaś ca samudvahanti te hemavarṇāḥ sudṛśo bhavanti //
SA07subhrk_u:408: SRKK_140 ujjvālikāṃ ye pradiśanti sadbhyaḥ śītāgame vastram athāpi geham /
SA07subhrk_u:409: pānaṃ vicitraṃ varakanyakāṃ vā te janmabhūmau sukhino bhavanti //
SA07subhrk_u:410: SRKK_141 dīrghāyur eva bhuvi sarvarujā vimuktaḥ prāpnoti saukḥyam atulaṃ satataṃ prahṛṣṭaḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:411: devodbhavāni vividhāni sukhāni bhuṅkte prāṇātipātavirataḥ khalu yas tu vidvān //
SA07subhrk_u:412: SRKK_142 dṛṣṭvā parasya vibhavaṃ na karoti cauryaṃ guptiṃ ca yaḥ prakurute parirakṣaṇārtham /
SA07subhrk_u:413: prāpnoty asau draviṇasaṃpadam aprameyāṃ sarvais tu taskaranṛpādiśatair ahāryām //
SA07subhrk_u:414: SRKK_143 dārān parasya parivarjayatīha yo 'sau dārān asau labhata eva manojñarūpān /
SA07subhrk_u:415: śatrūdbhavo na hi janasya kadā cid eva lokasya vai bhavati viśvasanīya eva //
SA07subhrk_u:416: SRKK_144 nīlotpalasyaiva yathā hi gandho manojñarūpaḥ satataṃ pravāti /
SA07subhrk_u:417: tadvan manuṣyasya hi vāti gandho mukhād asatyaṃ tu na vakti yaś ca //
SA07subhrk_u:418: SRKK_145 sanmitrasamdhiṃ nṛpateś ca pūjāṃ bhaktyānvitaṃ putrakalatrabhṛtyam /
SA07subhrk_u:419: bhogān udārān sukham aprameyaṃ prāpnoti nityaṃ piśunād vimuktaḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:420: SRKK_146 ānandaśabdaṃ madhuraṃ śṛṇoti vākyāni nityaṃ sumanojñakāni /
SA07subhrk_u:421: deveṣu martyeṣu ca jāyate 'sau pāruṣyavākyād virato naro yaḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:422: SRKK_147 dharmārthasatyaniratā khalu yasya vāṇī loke sadā priyatamā bhavatīha nityam /
SA07subhrk_u:423: saṃpūjanāṃ sa labhate bahuratnajātair yāyāc cyuto vibudhalokam anantasaukhyam //
SA07subhrk_u:424: SRKK_148 sa tīvrarāgo bhavatīha naiva bhogair udāraiḥ satataṃ ca yuktaḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:425: ādeyavākyaḥ pṛthukīrtiyuktaḥ parasvatṛṣṇāvirato hi yo vai //
SA07subhrk_u:426: SRKK_149 prāsādikatvaṃ labhate sa nityaṃ sphītaṃ sukhaṃ rājyadhanādi loke /
SA07subhrk_u:427: brahmatvam āsādayatīha samyaṅ maitrasya cittasya vaśān manuṣyaḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:428: SRKK_150 svargāpavargaṃ samavāptukāmair narais tu nityaṃ samupārjanīyā /
SA07subhrk_u:429: astitvadṛṣṭiḥ paramā hi yasmāt sarvasya sā vai kuśalasya mūlam //
SA07subhrk_u:430: SRKK_151 śraddhānirākṛtamater na virohatīha puṇyaṃ hy udārabhuvanatrayasaukhyakāri /
SA07subhrk_u:431: tasmān nareṇa viduṣā satataṃ niṣevyā śraddhā samastaguṇaratnanidhānabhūtā //
SA07subhrk_u:432: SRKK_152 śraddhā śubhasya jananī jananī yathaiva saivādito manasi sādhujanair niveśyā /
SA07subhrk_u:433: śraddhākarena rahito na hi bodhipakṣasaddharmaratnanikaragrahaṇe samarthaḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:434: SRKK_153 bhraṣṭo yathādhipatyād aiśvaryaphalāni na hy avāpnoti /
SA07subhrk_u:436: SRKK_154 tasmān nareṇa viduṣā sugatādikeṣu kāryaṃ manaḥprasadanaṃ satataṃ hiteṣu /
SA07subhrk_u:437: niḥśeṣadoṣaśamanāya na cānyad asti śraddhā yathā dahati doṣagaṇaṃ samastam //
SA07subhrk_u:439: darśayanty eva lokasya hy adātuḥ phalam īdṛśam //
SA07subhrk_u:441: śaśvat kṣudvihatā bhramanti yad amī dehīti bāhūcchritāḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:443: prāyo 'lpaṃ sakṛd apy amībhir aśanam dattaṃ na kasmai cana //
SA07subhrk_u:444: SRKK_157 sūcīmukhāḥ kuharanetraviśuṣkagātrāḥ keśāmbarā ravikaraiḥ paripītabhāsaḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:445: pretāḥ sadā salilalālasayā yad ārtās tat pānadānavikalasya phalaṃ vadanti //
SA07subhrk_u:446: dānaṃ sarvasukhaṃ mahābhayaharaṃ bhāgyaṃ mahac cārthadaṃ
SA07subhrk_u:453: bimbaṃ snānaṃ tathā gandhaś chattraṃ dhātoś ca ropaṇam // 1 //
SA07subhrk_u:456: kṣetraṃ vicitraṃ caivānta ity etā bahudhā bhṛśam /
SA07subhrk_u:457: kathā dvāviṃśatiḥ proktā bhūyo dānasya varṇane // 3 //
SA07subhrk_u:458: SRKK_159 yathāmbupūrṇaḥ sabhujaṅgamo hradaḥ praphullaśākhaś ca sakaṇṭako drumaḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:459: śrutena vittena kulena cānvitas tathāvidhaḥ śīlaparāṅmukho janaḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:460: SRKK_160 varaṃ daridro 'pi suśīlavān bhaven na cārthavān apy analaṃkṛto guṇaiḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:461: daridrabhāve 'pi hi sajjanaḥ stuto raso guṇānām amṛtād viśiṣyate //
SA07subhrk_u:462: SRKK_161 saṃmānayanti guravo guṇavantam āryaṃ tejasvino 'pi dhanino 'pi manasvino 'pi /
SA07subhrk_u:463: tasmān naro narapater api yaḥ sakāśāt saṃmānam icchati sa rakṣatu śīlam eva //
SA07subhrk_u:464: SRKK_162 loke sukhaṃ viṣayajaṃ sabhayaṃ savairaṃ dharmātmanaḥ kṛtamateḥ sukham uttamaṃ tu /
SA07subhrk_u:465: tasmān naraḥ sukham udāram ahāryam āryaṃ yaḥ prāptum icchati sa rakṣatu śīlam eva //
SA07subhrk_u:466: SRKK_163 yo bhraṣṭaśīlavinayasya vināśakāle trāsaḥ samāviśati śīlavato na so 'sti /
SA07subhrk_u:467: tasmāt prahṛṣṭavinayaḥ paralokam ante yo gantum icchati sa rakṣatu śīlam eva //
SA07subhrk_u:468: SRKK_164 śīlena niścayadṛḍhena divaṃ prayāti nātmaklamena na kudṛṣṭikṛtair vimārgaiḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:469: tasmād ṛte 'pi vanavāsam ṛte 'pi liṅgaṃ yaḥ svargam icchati sa rakṣatu śīlam eva //
SA07subhrk_u:470: SRKK_165 śīlaṃ vināśaharaṇāvaraṇādirakṣā śīlaṃ dhanaṃ paramam āryam ahāryam anyaiḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:471: śīlaṃ sthiraṃ vyupaśame 'py anugāmi mitraṃ śīlaṃ vibhūṣaṇam ṛte 'pi vibhūṣaṇebhyaḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:472: SRKK_166 na hy asti śīlasadṛśaṃ hitakāri mitraṃ snigdhāśayo na khalu śīlasamo 'sti bandhuḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:473: mātā pitā ca tanayāya vidhātum icched yaḥ śīlam ūrjitaphalaṃ hitam ādadhātu //
SA07subhrk_u:475: SRKK_167 sarvam etat sucaritaṃ dānaṃ sugatapūjanam /
SA07subhrk_u:476: kṛtaṃ kalpasahasrair yat pratighaḥ pratihanti tat //
SA07subhrk_u:477: SRKK_168 na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:478: tasmāt kṣāntiṃ prayatnena bhāvayed vividhair nayaiḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:479: SRKK_169 manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukham aśnute /
SA07subhrk_u:480: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite //
SA07subhrk_u:481: SRKK_170 na dviṣantaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti yāvajjīvam api ghnataḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:482: krodham ekaṃ tu yo hanyāt tena sarvadviṣo hatāḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:484: dahaty ātmānam evādau paraṃ dhakṣyati vā na vā //
SA07subhrk_u:485: SRKK_172 jarā rūpavatāṃ krodhaḥ tamaś cakṣuṣmatām api/
SA07subhrk_u:487: SRKK_173 matkarmacoditā hy ete jātā mayy apakāriṇaḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:488: yena yāsyanti narakān mayaivaite hatā nanu //
SA07subhrk_u:489: SRKK_174 etān āśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
SA07subhrk_u:490: mām āśritya tu yānty ete narakān dīrghavedanān //
SA07subhrk_u:491: SRKK_175 aham evāpakāry eṣāṃ mamaite copakāriṇaḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:493: SRKK_176 mukhyaṃ daṇḍādikaṃ hitvā prerake yadi kupyasi /
SA07subhrk_u:494: dveṣeṇa preritaḥ so 'pi dveṣe dveṣo 'stu me varam //
SA07subhrk_u:496: SRKK_177 vīryaṃ hi sarvaguṇaratnanidhānabhūtaṃ sarvāpadas tarati vīryamahāplavena /
SA07subhrk_u:497: naivāsti taj jagati vastu vicintyamānaṃ nāvāpnuyād yad iha vīryarathādhirūḍhaḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:499: hatvā ripūñ jayam anuttamam āpnuvanti visphūrjitaṃ tad iha vīryamahābhaṭasya //
SA07subhrk_u:501: vīryeṇa goṣpadam iva pravilaṅghya śūrāḥ kurvanty anarghaguṇaratnadhanārjanāni //
SA07subhrk_u:506: SRKK_181 yad devā viyati vimānavāsino ye nirdvandvāḥ samanubhavanti saumanasyam /
SA07subhrk_u:507: atyantaṃ vipulaphalaprasūtihetor vīryasya sthiravihitasya sā vibhūtiḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:509: SRKK_182 kleśārivargaṃ tv abhibhūya dhīrāḥ saṃbodhilakṣmīpadam āpnuvanti /
SA07subhrk_u:510: bodhyaṅgadānaṃ pradiśanti sadbhyo dhyānaṃ hi tatra pravadanti hetum //
SA07subhrk_u:512: ākāśatulyamanasaḥ samaloṣṭahemā dhyānād bhavanti manujā guṇahetubhūtāḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:515: sattve jñānādhipatyaṃ vigataripubhayāḥ kurvate yan narendrā
SA07subhrk_u:516: dhyānaṃ tatraikahetuṃ sakalaguṇanidhiṃ prāhur āryā guṇaughāḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:517: SRKK_185 mohāndhakāraṃ pravidārya śaśvaj jñānāvabhāsaṃ kurute samantāt /
SA07subhrk_u:518: saṃbuddhasūryaḥ suramānuṣāṇāṃ hetuḥ sa tatra pravaraḥ samādhiḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:520: SRKK_186 prajñādhanena vikalaṃ tu narasya rūpam ālekhyarūpam iva sāravihīnam antaḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:521: buddhyānvitasya phalam iṣṭam udeti vīryād vīryaṃ tu buddhirahitaṃ svavadhāya śatruḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:522: SRKK_187 yo 'nekajanmāntaritaṃ svajanma bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyat kulanāmagotraiḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:523: madhyāntavidyo 'pi janaḥ pravetti prajñābalaṃ tat kathayanti tajjñāḥ //
SA07subhrk_u:524: yad buddho martyaloke malatimiragaṇaṃ dārayitvā mahāntaṃ
SA07subhrk_u:525: jñānālokaṃ karoti praharati ca sadā doṣavṛndaṃ narāṇām /
SA07subhrk_u:526: ādeṣṭā cendriyāṇāṃ paramanujamano vetti sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ
SA07subhrk_u:527: prajñāṃ tatrāpi nityaṃ śubhavarajananīṃ hetum utkīrtayanti //
SA07subhrk_u:528: SRKK_189 kāryārṇave cāpi drdhaṃ nimagnāḥ saṃgrāmamadhye manujāḥ pradhānāḥ /
SA07subhrk_u:529: prajñāvaśāt te vijayaṃ labhante prajñā yataḥ sā śubhahetubhūtā //
SA07subhrk_u:531: na prajñāvikalā vibhānti puruṣāḥ prātaḥ pradīpā iva /
SA07subhrk_u:535: SRKK_191 svargāpavargaguṇaratnanidhānabhūtā etāḥ ṣaḍ eva bhuvi pāramitā narāṇām /
SA07subhrk_u:536: jñātvā naraḥ svahitasādhanatatparaḥ san kuryān na kaḥ satatam āsu dṛḍhaṃ prayatnam //
